reviews.review: a true slice of awesome. I loved Portal but this is better, the parts with the coloured gels in particular stood out for me, a nice little twist to the already great portal mechanic. Heartily recommended to anyone with a brain who likes FUN !

Maravilloso. duplica al original en ingenio, diversión, duración, variedad y gráficos. Jugar el cooperativo con un amigo es una experiencia única. Un juegazo donde los haya y, ahora que tiene cámaras de la comunidad, infinito.
jaja

An evolutionary improvemant over the first Portal. More humour, more backstory, more levels, more puzzle elements, a fantastically devious co-op campaign, a built in test chamber designer, and if you want more control over your new chambers there's the Portal 2 Authoring Tool.

In other words it's a beefed up Portal, and it shows. I found certain portions of the campaign where the pace seems to have slowed up. While I never had this issue with Portal. Other than that though, it's still a great game.
I really like to dialogue of this game and the co-op with friends works great too.

One of my favorite games in the world

Just all around awesome

Awesome game and perfect for coop! I recommend it on PC and PS3!

Imagine the original Portal, add updated graphics, a more fleshed out plot and an end-game co-op campaing. 

Add a 2 to the title and you get what in essence is, Portal 2.

Did I mention this game has a in-game level editor?
Отличное продолжение, достойный шедевр Valve.

"...and Part Four: Bombs! For throwing at you." ~~Wheatley

Well, you don't get to tear him to pieces and throw every piece into a fire, but there's still some amazing satisfaction when you [REDACTED] and then he [REDACTED] and the end credits are amazing. This game also introduces the Co-operative Testing Initiative, a co-op game mode that takes place after the main storyline (though you don't need to finish the main storyline to play it) and the Perpetual Testing Initiative. Basically, you build a box full of stuff. You put other people in the box. The people do stuff with the stuff and get out.

Cave Johnson, we're done here.

The singleplayer is really good. The story surprised me with how compelling it was. The few characters in this game are really well done. Really satisfying to solve the puzzles. Just has a bit of a slow start but other than that, this is a great game. 

Co-op is a blast too. Don't buy this game and not play the co-op, it's awesome.

tl;dr Great Co-op, Great Singleplayer.

Builds on all the charm and humour of the first game, a very worthy successor. Co-op is also a lot of fun, and now the new community content will just add to the replayability.

Portal 2 is a first person puzzle game revolving around the use of portals. This is the sequel to Portal which I would highly recommend playing first but this game will bring you hours of entertainment and frustration through the single player campaign however it is worth every hour you will throw at this game. 

To further increase playtime there is also a co-operative campaign which will bring you and friends closer together and also give you both hours of entertainment. The co-op will however make you both realise how silly you are when you find the solution to be something so simple.

Finally there is also community chambers where people can create and upload their portal maps to the steam workshop for you to be able to download and some really do feel that they could be part of the game developed from valve which will give you even more playtime in this game.

The graphics are good of what you see and well developed, the controls are very basic only using wasd and the two mouse buttons but it makes this game very enjoyable.

10/10
Excellent game.  Definitely play Portal first though so that you get the entire story.  Love the multiplayer feature and the ability to create your own levels.

Portal 2, je prostě boží! Grafické zpracování a logické hádanky mě prostě okouzlili, musím uznat že jsem se párkrát opravdu zapotil při vymýšlení řešení. Další věc která se mi opravdu líbila byl kooperativní multiplayer, který není jednoduchý a donutí oba hráče přemýšlet a spolupracovat. Hru můžu jenom doporučit, patří k nejlepším titulům, které můžete zakoupit.
Excelente

Vynikající spojení logických hádanek se skvělým příběhem a všudypřítomnými vtipy.
Velký počet inovací oproti prvnímu dílu, mimojiné i propracovaný kooperativní multiplayer pro dva hráče. To vše zabalené v krásném grafickém kabátku. Vývojáři z Valve si na této hře dali opravdu záležet, proto nemůžu jinak, než ji doporučit všemi deseti!

Interesting 3D puzzle game played in the first person. It's very well constructed and pretty but it felt a bit more "on rails" than the first game in that solutions were "advertised" by the limited placement of portals. The new environmental interactions like gels and gravity tubes make things more varied. Looking forward to playing the co-op levels to see how that affects gameplay. Very good and usually heavily discounted in the Steam sales.

Portal 2's story takes you on a journey that is comedic and dramatic. You learn more about Apature, Chell, and even Glados as you travel back into the labs hundreds of years in the future.

The Coop was a nice addition though be warned and play it after the main game, it seems that the coop story picks up after the game ends.

And then there is the map editor which fulfills all puzzle needs be it extremely hard puzzles are simple puzzles. The editor  lets you create and play them all.

Overall Portal 2 is a brilliant product worthy of a purchase, be it for the comedy or for the puzzles, Portal 2 is a well rounded game and is defintely as good if not better than the original.
GG , funny and interesting co-op
Fantastic. Definitely on the list of the best games I have ever played, including the first. Not to mention, it has one of the best game characters ever put into a game - Glados.
Co-op alone makes this game worth buying, if you've got expirence with the first one. If no, then the single-player too.
Explosive fun, filled to the brim with witty commentary, all of which includes a lovable story and awesome characthers. Buy it :D
